items.question: What types of logos can I create?
items.answer: You can create a variety of logos including wordmarks, symbols, emblems, and more. The AI generator adapts to your preferences, allowing for diverse design styles.

items.question: Can I customize my logo after generation?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can modify colors, fonts, and layouts easily to ensure the logo aligns perfectly with your brand vision.

items.question: What formats are available for download?
items.answer: Logos are available in high-resolution PNG, JPEG, and SVG formats to suit your needs, ensuring quality for both digital and print use.

items.question: How does the AI understand my brand preferences?
items.answer: The AI uses advanced algorithms to assess your choices and generate designs that resonate with contemporary branding aesthetics and industry standards.

items.question: Is there a limit on how many logos I can create?
items.answer: No, you can create as many logos as you need under the pay-as-you-go model. Experiment with different styles and ideas without limitations.

items.question: What is the pricing structure for logo generation?
items.answer: We follow a straightforward pay-as-you-go approach with no hidden fees. You only pay for each logo you generate, making it accessible for all budgets.

items.question: Can I use the logo for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! All logos created come with full commercial rights, allowing you to use them across various platforms without additional fees.

items.question: How does the AI ensure logo quality?
items.answer: Our AI generator employs design principles and current trends, ensuring that your logo is not only unique but also professional and appealing.

items.question: What support options are available if I need help?
items.answer: We offer extensive documentation, tutorials, and a dedicated support team available via email and chat for any queries or technical issues.

items.question: Can I save my progress and come back later?
items.answer: Yes! Your designs are auto-saved, so you can return anytime to finalize and download your logo.
